title: inHg to psi Converter (inch of mercury → PSI)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1 inHg (32°F) = 3386.389 Pa = 0.491097 psi 1 inHg (60°F) = 3376.85 Pa ≈ 0.48977 psi psi = inHg × factor_psi inHg = psi ÷ factor_psi
